definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: After taps was blown the young campers had to turn out their lights and go to bed.
sentences.chinese: 吹过熄灯号后，那些青年露营者就得熄灯睡觉。

sentences.english: I was caught In the middle of the Intersection when the light changed.
sentences.chinese: 当灯号转换时我被困在十字路口。

sentences.english: The plane homed in on the radio beacon.
sentences.chinese: 飞机按照导航台旌旗灯号下降。

sentences.english: Disobeying traffic signs, signals or road markings.
sentences.chinese: 不遵守交通标志，灯号，或路面标志。

sentences.english: It's not your number yet. Please wait for your number.
sentences.chinese: 领药号码还没到，请依灯号排队领药。

sentences.english: Night getting deeper, bugles of some far-away barracks streaked across the sky.
sentences.chinese: 夜渐渐深了，天空划过远处军营传来的熄灯号声。

sentences.english: Enginefailure, stop engine, showed not under command signal lights.
sentences.chinese: 主机故障，停车，显示失控灯号。

sentences.english: The System LED shows whether the system is receiving power and functioning correctly.
sentences.chinese: 系统灯号显示系统是否接收到供电并且正常工作。

sentences.english: He blew his mind out in a car. He didn't notice that the lights had changed.
sentences.chinese: 他在车里昏头了，他“居然”没注意到灯号已经变了。

sentences.english: Monitors the wet warning valve pressure switch's operation signal.
sentences.chinese: 监督干式报警阀压力开闭地行动旌旗灯号。

sentences.english: The role of phase shifter is signal phase shift from another perspective.
sentences.chinese: 移相器地感化是将旌旗灯号地相位挪动一个角度。

sentences.english: The ship gave out radio signals for help.
sentences.chinese: 船发出无线电旌旗灯号告急。

sentences.english: Please watch for your number above.

definition: Hsinpi township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Hsihu town in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
distance marker/pole marking distance on racetrack
to respond accordingly to/to adapt to/to cope with
same as 奔馳|奔驰[Ben1 chi2]
